name: X Flash (Downloadable Version)
description:
X Flash is a sandbox game by hydroid interactions

Controls 

right arrow to move right left arrow to move left space to jump 1-9 keys are blocks

0 key is to go back to normal 

scroll up the house to open it scroll down it to close it. g key = day,  h key= night

NOTE: This is the downloadable version for java,chromebook,macOS,linux and pretty much all computers that have a working hard drive.
